metadata.synopsis: A PAD reacting to finding the true name of Gond in a book. This PAD only triggers if the palyer knows that the true name of Gond can destroy the Neurocitor.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_Aturn on peace mode to avoid unnecessary fightsGo to -331; 6; -145Kill Zanner ToobinRead the book in his pocket.Go to -1935; 0; 441Search the nearby bookshelves for the Gond lore book.read it, and obesever the PAD afterwards.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: There it is. Gond's true name: Nebelun.
